message:
Dear Fellows, 
I'm a French PhD Researcher in Social Sciences, actually living in Taipei, Taiwan.  

I just published this first monograph study => [http://bit.ly/33QHI9P](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2F33QHI9P%3Ffbclid%3DIwAR1yfKrKMzM3diaB4Y09Qr7iwZ3kCLrW_5DFBQnMH-Va_J0CLYmU4hBLfIQ&h=AT2QkA6w3volLUJ77JiO8PGDx6BT0Zh2s1RJE45kfchQeho792j9Jpyns6XWWDuDY8qFy44Jod8KlvvJ45NEFssDwQ7mzyFY_A8Ea-kUeel84hPS-3_6Xo5ELNtz8-6cTp8VV_fm_rwDFWRNtEvQl_4ULEqXcloAAOJEwNxP) to present an overview of the context in which I'll start collecting datas on my research topic "Stakeholder engagement in Smart-City".  I have in mind to organize some meetups and workshops to write a participative diagnosis of Taipei City with inhabitants.  

I'm organizing a first meeting (in english) to present my research on Taipei City, this Saturday October 26th, from 10 am to 12am, at 大仁診所/ 【大仁講堂】=> [https://www.facebook.com/da.ren.ENT/](https://www.facebook.com/da.ren.ENT/)

Your presence would be very appreciate.
description: After a business trip with the EUTECC, to pitch my startup OpenPi in China last January, I was really interested in coming back in Asia…
name: TAIPEI MONOGRAPH: Chinese civilization, the particularities of Taiwan, and Taipei City.
caption: medium.com
